---



---


Added a styleguide page at `/styleguide`. It includes:

1. **Colors** - All design system colors (Mindero, Delft Blue, Celadon, Mint, Raspberry)
2. **Typography** - Heading styles and body text examples
3. **Buttons** - BaseButton component and custom styled button examples
4. **Cards** - Different card styles used throughout the app
5. **Links** - Standard and RouterLink styling
6. **Spacing** - Gap and padding examples
7. **Borders** - Border width and color variations

The route is added to the router. Access it at `/styleguide`. The page follows your design system with TailwindCSS classes and the custom color palette.

---
